#include<stdio.h>
#define ll long long
#define max(a,b) ((a>b)?a:b)
int main()
{
	int test;scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		ll n;ll dp[100010]={0};
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			ll num;scanf("%lld",&num);
			if(i==1)
				dp[1]=num;
			else
				dp[i]=max(num+dp[i-2],dp[i-1]);
		}
		printf("%lld\n",max(dp[n],dp[n-1]));
	}
	return 0;
}
